author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...BERYL GETTING STRONGER... ...EXPECTED TO BRING LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE TO THE WINDWARD ISLANDS AS A MAJOR HURRICANE...
summary:
...BERYL GETTING STRONGER... ...EXPECTED TO BRING LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE TO THE WINDWARD ISLANDS AS A MAJOR HURRICANE...
 As of 2:00 AM AST Sun Jun 30
 the center of Beryl was located near 10.5, -52.2
 with movement W at 20 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 983 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 90 mph.
